titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: General Booth has a letter in the "Times" under the heading "Divorce Problems". The salient paragraphs are literally taken from the letter I wrote to him on November 6
, of which a copy was entered in this journal. He does not allude to me, nor do I see any reason why he sh
have done so: but the procedure is unusual.

body.p: George Nimmins arrived to dine & stay the night. He is about to transfer himself from London to Liverpool.
